name: Demeter & Persephone
description:
This is the story of Demeter, who loved her daughter more than anything on Earth. 
It is an adaptation of the famous Greek myth, known as the Abduction of Persephone.

CREDITS

  • Created with bitsy, a game making tool by Adam Le Doux.
  • Music is Moonlight Sonata (movement I) composed by Ludvig van Beethoven, performed by Paul Pitman for Musopen, edited by friendlycosmonaut. 
  • The final image in the game is based on the painting The Return of Persephone, by Frederic Leighton.
